properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:30PM EST until February 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for portions of the following waterways in central and
southern Indiana...

Mill Creek...White River...

.Lowland flooding is expected to develop along the White River and
Mill Creek as a result of about 2 inches of rain that fell across the
area in the past 48 hours. Significant flooding is not expected.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the White River at Ravenswood.
* until Wednesday evening.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 6.0 feet.
* Forecast...It is forecast to crest at 7.1 feet Tuesday afternoon
and will fall below flood stage by Wednesday morning.
* At 6.0 feet...Lowest portion of Ravenswood begins to flood.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
